* * *

THE HAB MODEL IS FINISHED! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Complete | Incomplete

Plans:

- **Stage 1**: *(Current Stage)*  

    - KRV Base Model
    - HAB Base Model
    - Landing Leg Modeling & Animation
    - Retro Rocket Models
    - Texturing

- **Stage 2**:
- - Avionics Package
    - Aerodynamics
    - Mass
    - Resources
    - Game Configuration
    - Game Balancing
    - Version 0.1 Released

- **Stage 3**:  

    - IVA
    - Texture Finalization
    - Modeling Finalization
    - Part Configuration Finalization
    - Version 1.0 Release

- **Future Releases**:  

    - ***JSI*** Raster Prop Monitor Integration?
    - Rover?
    - Additional Duna Base Components such as a greenhouse, ***Kethane*** Drill?, Science Lab/ Mobile Experiments.

* * *

Videos:

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8xbaYfQDKu0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

* * *

Help Needed:

I am making great progress on the modeling and I can make models fairly easily... but I AM USELESS at texturing... So what I really need is someone to help me texture.
